about_the_game:
DLC Girls 003 Celestina Demonic

God of evil originates from pure blooded devil not from humans or elves.
But Cerestina has completely broken this law. Human but also god of evil. She is a sorceress with overwhelming magical power
which the whole world fears and has yet to face defeat making her the most powerful person without question.
Her beautifully shaped body and fair white skin, bluish hair as if reflecting the sky and the ocean.
Given her power and beauty it is not surprising that many filled with great desire have sought her hand in marriage
including maybe not so often but also from women. However, she has refused all suitors. There is only one qualification
to become her companion. One who is strong enough to defeat her.
Naturally, there has been no one with greater strength than her.
To be sure, she has never cruelly killed anybody who has approached her with good intention
but her disappointment grew with every overwhelming demonstration of her power.
She started to become very bored with her life. Is it so impossible for her dream to come true.
Would it be possible to fulfill her dream of being ravaged until senseless by a man stronger than herself.
Once she opened her eyes after a long sigh the place was a space where magic and power became useless.
Only one thing mattered, in a space filled with sexual lust enough to inflame her skin weakly Cerestina
opened her bag of desire which she had kept tightly closed.

content_descriptors.notes:
